title: Devin Townsend Discography (Complete with Rares)
description:
Full Devin Townsend Discography

All mp3s are at least 192k CBR.  If it differs from that, I'll note it.  All VBRs are set to highest quality. 32-320 or whatever the hell it is... 
There should be the appropriate album covers embedded in each file.
